sections.title: Platform support
sections.summary:
### [*] 20/20 points: Supports 5 of 6 possible platforms (**iOS**, **Android**, Web, **Windows**, **MacOS**, **Linux**)

* ✓ Android
* ✓ iOS
* ✓ Windows
* ✓ Linux
* ✓ MacOS

These platforms are not supported:

<details>
<summary>
Package does not support platform `Web`.
</summary>

Because:
* `package:path_provider/path_provider.dart` that declares support for platforms: `Android`, `iOS`, `Windows`, `Linux`, `macOS`.
</details>

sections.title: Support up-to-date dependencies
sections.summary:
### [*] 10/10 points: All of the package dependencies are supported in the latest version

|Package|Constraint|Compatible|Latest|
|:-|:-|:-|:-|
|[`flutter`]|`flutter`|0.0.0|0.0.0|
|[`path_provider_android`]|`^2.0.6`|2.0.20|2.0.20|
|[`path_provider_ios`]|`^2.0.6`|2.0.11|2.0.11|
|[`path_provider_linux`]|`^2.0.1`|2.1.7|2.1.7|
|[`path_provider_macos`]|`^2.0.0`|2.0.6|2.0.6|
|[`path_provider_platform_interface`]|`^2.0.0`|2.0.4|2.0.4|
|[`path_provider_windows`]|`^2.0.2`|2.1.3|2.1.3|

<details><summary>Transitive dependencies</summary>

|Package|Constraint|Compatible|Latest|
|:-|:-|:-|:-|
|[`characters`]|-|1.2.1|1.2.1|
|[`collection`]|-|1.16.0|1.16.0|
|[`ffi`]|-|2.0.1|2.0.1|
|[`file`]|-|6.1.4|6.1.4|
|[`material_color_utilities`]|-|0.1.5|0.2.0|
|[`meta`]|-|1.8.0|1.8.0|
|[`path`]|-|1.8.2|1.8.2|
|[`platform`]|-|3.1.0|3.1.0|
|[`plugin_platform_interface`]|-|2.1.3|2.1.3|
|[`process`]|-|4.2.4|4.2.4|
|[`sky_engine`]|-|0.0.99|0.0.99|
|[`vector_math`]|-|2.1.2|2.1.4|
|[`win32`]|-|3.0.0|3.0.0|
|[`xdg_directories`]|-|0.2.0+2|0.2.0+2|
</details>

To reproduce run `dart pub outdated --no-dev-dependencies --up-to-date --no-dependency-overrides`.
